# Draft:The Hidden War

The Hidden War is a 2025 non-fiction book by British-American entrepreneur and boxing manager Cassius Keita. It presents forty principles on power, psychological control and strategic behaviour. The book has been mentioned in media coverage of Keita’s work on discipline and performance.
Overview
The Hidden War explores psychological warfare, self-mastery and modern strategy. Each chapter – or "law" – examines a different principle of discipline and influence. Keita’s writing style mixes philosophical reflection with practical frameworks from his experience in business and combat sports.
Publication
The book was released on 26 July 2025 as a digital edition through Apple Books, Booktopia, Indigo, Everand, Smashwords, Chartoo/iTunes, and Bol.com.
Themes
The book focuses on discipline, control and strategic decision-making. It argues that influence and resilience arise from measured action and emotional control.
Reception
Coverage in GQ South Africa and CryptoDaily linked the book to Keita’s broader career as a strategist in boxing and personal development.
